title: Chrome OS isn't ready for tablets yet
description: Chrome OS tablets are coming in fast to replace the Android tablets. But is Chrome OS any good on a tablet? In this episode of Processor, Dieter spends some time with Acer's Chromebook Tab 10 education tablet to see how Google has evolved their OS.
